citations.narrative:
The licensee does not have acquisition records for one of the elk, one of the bison, and seven of the goats. There are also
no disposition records for two of the bison. Not documenting all the intake and disposition information of all the animals on
site does not allow for proper tracking by an APHIS official. All regulated animals must have all intake and disposition
information properly documented. Correct by 10/20/23.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representative.
End of report.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The licensee does not have acquisition records for one of the elk, one of the bison, and seven of the goats. There are also 
no disposition records for two of the bison. Not documenting all the intake and disposition information of all the animals on 
site does not allow for proper tracking by an APHIS official. All regulated animals must have all intake and disposition 
information properly documented. Correct by 10/20/23. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representative. 
 
End of report.
